nodes.text: Soboll Command Center was a Thaereian military base located in the platform city of Soboll, on Cularin.

The Sullustan Mub Tyeb was hired by the Thaereians to maintain the security systems in the base. During the Clone Wars, the Thaereians withdrew all their land forces on Cularin to Soboll and the Heroes of Cularin were sent there to capture the commander of their forces there, Kurth San. They rendezvoused with Tyeb and he created a loophole in the security systems that allowed the heroes to enter the base, where they confronted San.
